com.github.moribund.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.entity.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, PlayableCharacter

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayableCharacter, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    The Player that is being controlled by a client. The Player is a type of InputProcessor for it is bound to keyBinds.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Set<Flag> flags
      The currently active Flags on the Player.
      private it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.AbstractInt2ObjectMap<PlayerAction> keyBinds
      The respective Input.Keys that are bound to Runnable methods defined in this class.
      private int playerId
      The unique player ID based on the Connection of the client to the server.
      private com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite sprite
      The Sprite of this Player that represents the Player in the live game visually.
      private Tile tile
      The tile the Player currently resides on.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(int playerId)
      Makes a Player with its unique player ID generated by the Connection between the client and the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bindKeys()
      Binds the keys to the keyBinds using the Input.Keys constants to delegate Runnable actions.

      Draws the player onto the screen.

      Flags a new Flag on the player.

      Gets the current Tile the player is on.

      boolean keyDown(int keycode)
      Called when a key was pressed
      void keyPressed(int keyPressed)
      Handles the key being pressed by a player after it has gone through client-server latency.

      Called when a key was typed
      void keyUnpressed(int keyUnpressed)
      Handles the key being lifted by a player after it has gone through client-server latency.
      boolean keyUp(int keycode)
      Called when a key was released
      boolean mouseMoved(int screenX, int screenY)
      Called when the mouse was moved without any buttons being pressed.
      boolean scrolled(int amount)
      Called when the mouse wheel was scrolled.
      private void sendTilePacket()
      Sends the current position of the Player to the server so that positions can be updated server-sided.
      boolean touchDown(int screenX, int screenY, int pointer, int button)
      Called when the screen was touched or a mouse button was pressed.
      boolean touchDragged(int screenX, int screenY, int pointer)
      Called when a finger or the mouse was dragged.
      boolean touchUp(int screenX, int screenY, int pointer, int button)
      Called when a finger was lifted or a mouse button was released.
      private void unflag(Flag flag)
      Removes a Flag on the player.

      • touchDown

                         int screenY,
                         int pointer,
                         int button)
        Description copied from interface: com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Called when the screen was touched or a mouse button was pressed. The button parameter will be Input.Buttons.LEFT on iOS.
        Specified by:
        touchDown in interface com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
        Parameters:
        screenX - The x coordinate, origin is in the upper left corner
        screenY - The y coordinate, origin is in the upper left corner
        pointer - the pointer for the event.
        button - the button
        Returns:
        whether the input was processed
